creator: benoit.moussaud@criltelecom.com
text:
Sometimes, following the packaging and the sources files the java2iiop.exe 
launch by the BorlandEJBTask can be blocked by warning messages displayed on 
the output.
To avoid this it is possible to set several other parameters that mask the 
warning messages and allow the process to continue.
The BorlandEjbTask supports the additional parameter by having a new parameter 
called "java2iiopParams"

Created attachment 6046
Diff for the java sources files: BorlandDeploymentTool.java
creator: benoit.moussaud@criltelecom.com
benoit.moussaud@criltelecom.com
